languages.text: {n}Лорд-инквизитор одобрительно кивает.{/n} "Уже лучше. Вы больше не пытаетесь лгать. Кажется, наше общение выходит в правильное русло".

traits.locale_text: {n}Лорд-инквизитор одобрительно кивает.{/n} "Уже лучше. Вы больше не пытаетесь лгать. Кажется, наше общение выходит в правильное русло".

languages.text: {n}Calcazar nods his approval.{/n} "Better. You are no longer trying to lie. It seems that our relationship is now on the right track."

languages.text: {n}カルカサルは肯定的にうなずく。{/n}「いいだろう。もう嘘をつく意思はないようだ。我らの関係はようやく軌道に乗ったとみえる」
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar nods his approval.{/n} "Better. You are no longer trying to lie. It seems that our relationship is now on the right track."

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルは肯定的にうなずく。{/n}「いいだろう。もう嘘をつく意思はないようだ。我らの関係はようやく軌道に乗ったとみえる」

languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar nods his approval.{/n} "Better. You are no longer trying to lie. It seems that our relationship is now on the right track."

languages.text: {n}卡尔卡扎赞许地点了点头。{/n}“这样就好多了。只要你不继续撒谎，我们的合作就会容易得多。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar nods his approval.{/n} "Better. You are no longer trying to lie. It seems that our relationship is now on the right track."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡尔卡扎赞许地点了点头。{/n}“这样就好多了。只要你不继续撒谎，我们的合作就会容易得多。”

languages.text: {n}Calcazar asiente con aprobación.{/n} «Mejor. Ya no está intentando mentirme. Parece que ahora nuestra relación va por el buen camino».
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar nods his approval.{/n} "Better. You are no longer trying to lie. It seems that our relationship is now on the right track."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar asiente con aprobación.{/n} «Mejor. Ya no está intentando mentirme. Parece que ahora nuestra relación va por el buen camino».

languages.text: {n}Calcazar hoche la tête en signe d'approbation.{/n} « C'est mieux. Vous n'essayez plus de mentir. Il semblerait que notre relation soit en bonne voie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar nods his approval.{/n} "Better. You are no longer trying to lie. It seems that our relationship is now on the right track."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar hoche la tête en signe d'approbation.{/n} « C'est mieux. Vous n'essayez plus de mentir. Il semblerait que notre relation soit en bonne voie. »

languages.text: {n}Calcazar nickt wohlwollend.{/n} "Besser. Ihr versucht nicht länger zu lügen. Anscheinend ist unser Verhältnis jetzt auf dem richtigen Kurs."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar nods his approval.{/n} "Better. You are no longer trying to lie. It seems that our relationship is now on the right track."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar nickt wohlwollend.{/n} "Besser. Ihr versucht nicht länger zu lügen. Anscheinend ist unser Verhältnis jetzt auf dem richtigen Kurs."

languages.text: {n}Calcazar, onaylar anlamda başını sallıyor.{/n} "Böylesi daha iyi. Artık yalan söylemeye çalışmıyorsun. Aramızdaki ilişki, rayına oturmuş gibi görünüyor."
